author: Jerome Derenne
designation: From Innovation Strategy to Delivery. Currently driving Cloud Data Transformation & Customer Journey Innovation @ Proximus
postText:
These last 18 months at Proximus where very busy.

1)Leading Data Transformation with the data lake/big data setup and implementation (along with data governance etc.) on Cloudera with a fantastic team.

2)Transform our team in an Agile way of working, introducing Fail Fast approach, and bring Innovation methods to better deliver on a green field environnement.

3)Lead the Selfcare Customer Journey experience enhancement with talentuous and collaborative people.

I am now taking the challenge of leading (ai) the Digital and IT for our Residential Market. Keeping the delivery excellence while embracing Innovation (a topic always close to my heart) and challenging the status-quo.

postText:
Online zichtbaarheid is essentieel om je bedrijf bekend te maken en je te onderscheiden van de concurrentie. Maar als professional heb je niet altijd de tijd of de technische vaardigheden om dit te realiseren.

author: Robin Somers
postText:
I graduated... again! 8 weeks of learning ended with a bang last night, at the graduation event of the Take the Lead program by Vlerick Business School

Happy to be part of the first cohort of graduates in this Sustainability Management program, together with fellow Proximus colleagues Tanguy Herriau, Kurt. De. Lange, Romy De Maeyer & Joanna Stecyk

More than ready to start implementing the insights gathered and further reinforce Proximus' sustainability strategy. Let's be critical, constructive and open-minded to tackle this challenge and turn hope into action. I'm up for it!

#sustainability #WeAreProximus

author: Simon Vanleeuw
postText:
Hi everyone,

I'm super excited to anounce that I will be making a big step in my life today, not only will I join Hike One to continue my interaction design journey in order to continue to reach new UX milestones, but I will also switch countries, trading the life of Brussels for a new life in Rotterdam, NL.

It wasn't an easy decision, however, as I had to leave my awesome colleagues at Proximus (made possible thanks to my consultancy agency Movify), from whom I learned so much, and really got to enjoy their company a lot. I really want to thank you all for the great times together.

Starting today, I'm really excited to explore what UX challenges the Netherlands has in store, and I know that my new agency is the place to discover that. Happy to be on board!

comments.commentAuthorDesignation: Senior Digital Experience Designer at adidas

author: Kristof Gilleman
designation: Head of Product Management bij SkeyDrone
postText:
I am thrilled to announce that I'll be joining the management of SkeyDrone as Head of Product Development!
It will be a totally different environment, with strong shoulders from skeyes & Brussels Airport Company to lean on. Thank you Hendrik-Jan Van Der Gucht & team for your trust and Jan Piet Hermans for guiding me to this great opportunity!

I look back gratefully to the 17 years of learning opportunities at Proximus. I got many chances and grew both professionally and personnally. Most of all: I met so many inspiring & talented people.

I definitely want to thank the many people that contacted me with tips & encouragements during my search for a new challenge. Special kudo's to Petra Vanspauwen & Petra Ivens üìå Loopbaanexpert. I enjoyed a nice period off and am fully ready to fly in this new adventure!
